reviewText: love this little known movie and the music is terrific.  This is a little gem so grab a copy if you love British storytelling with music thrown in.
This product is no better than a poor standard VHS transfer - Grainy & poor sound - Total Disappointment for a great film
its a film ill always remember. the first time i seen it i was 12 and ive always wanted it but it very hard to get my hands on it
